gemini-cli.name: gemini-cli
gemini-cli.notes: Uses gemini-mcp-tool package. Requires GEMINI_API_KEY. Alternative: @jacob/gemini-cli-mcp uses OAuth.

gemini-cli-oauth.description: Google Gemini CLI with OAuth (no API key needed)
